name: com.readyplayerme.core
description:
This Module contains all the core functionality required for using Ready Player Me avatars in Unity, including features such as: 
 - Module management and automatic package setup logic
 - Avatar loading from .glb files 
 - Avatar creation 
 - Avatar and 2D render requests 
 - Optional Analytics
 - Custom editor windows
 - Sample scenes and assets

samples.description: This quick start sample demonstrates how to load an avatar with a third person controller setup.
These samples showcase various ways to load an avatar into a scene.
These samples showcase how to creates a 2D renders of an avatar using the Render API.
This sample includes a WebGL template and demonstrates how run the Ready Player Me Web avatar creator inside an iFrame for WebGL applications.
This sample demonstrates how to implement a Ready Player Me Avatar Creator using Unity's built in UI system without the need for an embedded Web Browser.
